riskReward.title: Risk/Reward Analysis
riskReward.tipText: Professional traders typically aim for a risk/reward ratio of at least 1:2 or better. This means risking $1 to potentially gain $2, improving your chances of long-term profitability.

simulator.simulationTipText: These scenarios show potential outcomes based on different take-profit levels. A 1:2 or 1:3 ratio is generally preferred by professional traders for better long-term profitability.
